title: The Little Book of Muses
description: The Little Book of Muses invites the reader to embark on a magical journey to discover the beauty of the written word. In its pages you will find a collection of phrases to invoke the warm spirit of the writer. From elegant phrases, humorous expressions to thought-provoking reflections, this book offers a generous dose of literary inspiration.The Little Book of Muses is a BookRiot recommended book as one of the 8 best books to prep writers for Nanowrimo 2020.
author: Khaled Talib
